name: Poker Arena: Card Game
description:
Grab your poker chips and play the best free online Texas Holdem poker from MY.COM!

Your hand is ready — start playing poker right now!

Get your friends and play with them stunningly addictive Texas Hold`Em poker, rendered with amazing graphics and user-friendly interface — just like in a real poker casino!

Win, bluff and talk with other poker players via in-game chat! And, of course, give them poker gifts and presents!

Unfamiliar with rules of Texas Holdem poker? Not a problem! Poker Arena works great for both newbies and pros! Tutorial & virtual assistant along with table of poker combinations plus visual demo of the strength of your current poker hand!

Finally, you can play Poker Arena offline: hone your poker skills in the dramatic single player poker campaign called “Trixie’s Story” or via Training mode, competing against virtual poker opponents!

Here you can download the official version of Poker Arena for your iOS devices.

Super Texas Holdem Poker Features:

- Free to play online & offline poker!
- Thousands of poker players available 24/7!
- Bonus poker chips for playing every day!
- Weekly Texas Holdem poker tournaments!
- Tons of poker gifts and presents!
- Single player & Training mode available offline!
- Tutorial and useful tips for newbies!
- In-game chat!
- Visual demo for your current poker hand strength!
- Built-in table of poker combinations!
- Regular updates and improvements!

Bring your friends and take your places at the poker table!

Poker Arena from MY.COM is all you need for the winning!
